# Kemal Akkoyun

> Software Infrastructure Engineer, System Programmer, and Performance Engineer writing about observability, profiling, eBPF, Go, and performance engineering.
> For every page, you can add `index.md` to the URL to get a markdown version in plain text that you can use as context for calls to LLMs.

You can find [more information about Kemal on this page](/about/index.md).

## About

- [About Kemal](/about/index.md) - Professional background, journey, and expertise
- [What I'm doing now](/now/index.md) - Current activities and focus areas
- [Uses](/uses/index.md) - Tools and software in use
- [Misc](/misc/index.md) - Everything else

## Key Topics

- [Observability](/tags/observability/index.md) - Monitoring, instrumentation, and system visibility
- [Profiling](/tags/profiling/index.md) - Performance profiling and continuous profiling
- [eBPF](/tags/ebpf/index.md) - Linux kernel observability and instrumentation
- [Go](/tags/go/index.md) - Go programming, toolchain, and runtime
- [Performance](/tags/performance/index.md) - Performance engineering and optimization
- [Open Source](/tags/open-source/index.md) - Open source contributions and projects
- [Blog](/tags/blog/index.md) - General blog posts and reflections

## Content Sections

- [Posts](/posts/index.md) - Technical blog posts
- [Notes](/notes/index.md) - Short-form notes and thoughts
- [Talks](/categories/talks/index.md) - Conference talks and presentations
